name: 英語演講：演說技巧
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習◎必須先修過【ENU0269  英語會話（一）】、【ENU0270  英語會話（二）】
goals: Learn effective techniques to control nervousness
Learn the art of mind-mapping, brainstorming, and outlining
syllabus: This course aims to introduce you to the basics of interpersonal communication and public speaking. In particular, emphasis will be placed on audience analysis, outlining, designing and delivering a range of speeches. In addition, skills in overcoming nervousness, developing confidence and dynamtic verbal profile in oral presentations will be covered.
prerequisite: ◎Exclusive for students within this department(including dual degree program)Prerequisite course: 【ENU0269  English Conversation (I)】、【ENU0270  English Conversation (II)】
